


```{r}
soil <- read.csv("soil.csv")
soil <- soil %>%
  select(-row, -stake) %>%
  rename %>%
  mutate(soil = case_when(
    soil == "FF" ~ "Forest floor",
    soil == "MIN" ~ "Mineral soil",
    TRUE ~ soil)) %>%
  mutate(site = case_when(
    site == "P1" ~ "Plow 1",
    site == "P2" ~ "Plow 2",
    site == "S1" ~ "Pasture 1",
    site == "S2" ~ "Pasture 2",
    site == "W1" ~ "Woodlot 1",
    site == "W2" ~ "Woodlot 2",
    TRUE ~ site))
```
